episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Regional Resilience
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Regional Resilience.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down SD73 adds new accessible school bus to increase equitable field trip transportation and NVIDIA is still planning to make a 'huge' investment in OpenAI, CEO says, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into regional resilience, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
